Articles.Content: Well when I was walking down the stairs with my tablet it slipped out of my hand and the screen has a huge crack on it. I damaged the touch part so I can no longer use it. Is it possible to get a new screen without the manufacture doesn\'t offer screens. I only have the 1 year limited warranty which doesn\'t cover this. How would I get this fixed?
Can you give a model number and I can look around

Ermm pretty sure it\'s a Cruz T301. It\'s only maybe 7 months since I got it. Pretty sure there aren\'t any replacement screens but...

Also, if they don\'t have a replacement I\'ll just wait for their android 4.0 tablets to come out.
I havent found anything yet but is the led screen broken or just the digitizer?
